body:
There are some Caffe2 dependencies like Eigen that are starting to show up right now - they should all be clearly listed in `cmake/Dependencies.cmake`. Eigen, though, should be built locally from `third_party` and so won't show up as an install-time dependency.

`BUILD_CAFFE2` hasn't been completely removed with this PR yet, but will be with https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/8338 . The plan is to have dependencies equivalent between the two by the time that lands.
